## PopulatableProtocol.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral.

**Signature:**

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedTransactionInterface<P, SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>>;
```
